00001 #include <epi.h>

00003 /*
00004  * epi-seir.c:
00005  */
00006 
00007 /*
00008  * epi_seir_compute: compute SEIR model for all agents in location LPn
00009  *
00010  * Assume that the probability of catching the disease is constant over time.
00011  * If the probability of catching the disease in one hour is P, then the
00012  * geometric distribution gives the number of hours before the disease is
00013  * caught.  We do a draw on the random number generator from the geometric
00014  * distribution and if the result is less than the time interval, then the
00015  * agent gets sick at that time.
00016  */
00017 void
00018 epi_seir_compute(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tw_lp * lp)
00019 {
00020         tw_stime         draw;
00021         tw_stime         delta_t;
00022 
00023         epi_agent       *a;
00024         epi_agent       *b;
00025 
00026         epi_ic_stage    *s;
00027 
00028         unsigned int     q_sz;
00029         unsigned int     i;
00030         unsigned int     j;
00031 
00032         void            *pq = state->pq;
00033 
00034         delta_t = tw_now(lp) - state->last_event;
00035 
00036 #if VERIFY_SEIR
00037         printf("%ld: SEIR_COMP delta_t %lf at %lf\n", lp->id, delta_t, tw_now(lp));
00038 #endif
00039 
00040         for(i = 0, q_sz = pq_get_size(pq); i < q_sz; i++)
00041         {
00042                 a = pq_next(pq, i);
00043 
00044                 if(a->stage != EPI_SUSCEPTIBLE)
00045                         continue;
00046 
00047                 // do not go through total location population, define
00048                 // contact pop as subset of overall, and walk through
00049                 // iteratively, or randomly
00050                 for (j = 0; j < q_sz; j++)
00051                 {
00052                         if(j == i)
00053                                 continue;
00054 
00055                         b = pq_next(pq, j);
00056                         s = &g_epi_stages[b->stage];
00057 
00058                         if(s->ln_multiplier != 0.0)
00059                         {
00060 #if 0
00061                                 // tw_geometric draws from uniform until the draw 
00062                                 // is greater than P.
00063                                 // tw_geometric then returns the number of draws.
00064                                 // For large P (which is 1.0 - multiplier) this could 
00065                                 // be very large.  Also note that tw_geometric 
00066                                 // always returns an integer of 1 or greater.
00067                                 draw = tw_rand_geometric(lp->id, 
00068                                         (s->start_multiplier + s->stop_multiplier)/2);
00069                                 state->stats->s_ndraws += draw;
00070                                 state->stats->s_nchecked++;
00071 #endif
00072 
00073                                 // Or, we can compute it directly as:
00074                                 // draw = log(random draw) / log(1 - prob of contagiousness)
00075 
00076                                 draw = tw_rand_unif(lp->rng);
00077 
00078                                 draw = log(draw);
00079                                 draw /= s->ln_multiplier;
00080 
00081 
00082                                 // multiply draw to factor in contact population
00083                                 draw *= q_sz;
00084 
00085                                 // Make agent sick
00086                                 if(draw <= delta_t)
00087                                 {
00088 #if VERIFY_SEIR
00089                                         printf("%ld: pop %d, draw %lf, delta_t %lf \n",
00090                                                 lp->id, q_sz, draw, delta_t);
00091 #endif
00092 
00093                                         g_epi_ct[a->ct][a->stage]--;
00094                                         a->stage++; // = EPI_INCUBATING;
00095                                         g_epi_ct[a->ct][a->stage]++;
00096                                         //g_epi_exposed_today++;
00097                                         
00098                                         s = &g_epi_stages[a->stage];
00099                                         a->ts_stage_tran = tw_rand_unif(lp->rng) * 
00100                                                         (s->max_duration - s->min_duration) + 
00101                                                         s->min_duration + tw_now(lp);
00102 
00103                                         break;
00104                                 }
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 }
